subject: Hockey, Ice
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Rangers acquired three draft picks from the Oilers in exchange for goaltender Cam Talbot and sent forward Carl Hagelin to the Ducks for Emerson Etem.
snippet: The Rangers acquired three draft picks from the Oilers in exchange for goaltender Cam Talbot and sent forward Carl Hagelin to the Ducks for Emerson Etem.
